title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Cognitive Load Management for Improving Online Mathematics Education Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through project-based tasks, learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies required in work environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze learning materials (text/visual) reflecting cognitive load theory in online course design with over 70% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate the ability to improve multimedia learning content that minimizes extraneous cognitive load through three or more peer reviews.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
